document.full_text: residents of the pakistani town of abbottabad were jolted from their sleep on sunday night by the boom of explosions, unaware the hunt for the world's most wanted man was coming to a bloody end in their sleepy hills.
document.title: pakistani hill town astonished by bin laden's death
lines_and_colors: residents of the pakistani town of abbottabad were jolted from their sleep on sunday night by the boom of explosions, unaware the hunt for the world's most wanted man was coming to a bloody end in their sleepy hills.
